name: CASE
description:
A minimalistic crime story.
The master of the house is dead. Above his body stands five suspects.
Find conflicts in their statements and identify the murderer.
The catch? Every question and every answer is expressed with only one word.
Entry for the GMTKjam 2019 with a theme "ONLY ONE".

CREDITS

@jarnik - programming, game design

@pwMoti -  game design, content and narrative

HOW TO PLAY

In the first part, your goal is to catch each suspect lying. Whenever you see a lie, click on the suspect to catch him/her. From that point onward you will see through that person and detect every it automatically.

Once all the suspects are caught it is time for part two.

Everyone lies. Now we need to find out why. Once again you have a chance to click on a character. When you do, the accusation choice will appear.
A suspect can be a THIEF, FAKE, in an AFAIR or a MURDERER.
But be careful. You have only one try for each accusation.
Wrong murderer accusation is an instant game over so it's better to leave it for the last.
